name: A Doctor's Tale (yuyureii)
description:
Have you ever wanted to fight viruses and become the hero the world needs?

Well here's your chance in this Undertale Parody: A Doctor's Tale! Play a doctor who's on a quest to help as many people as he can and kill as many diseases as possible in this alternate world.

Use WASD to move around and dodge, Enter to select an action, and Esc to continue.

Will you be able to save everyone?

...

Music from the official Undertale video game

Sfx found on freesound.org

Art assets by me!
